features: Electronic deadbolt Suitable for various places: Free CMS Customer Management System for effortless management across different settings. From residential homes and shops to apartments and warehouses, it offers a more convenient entry method while enhancing security. Easy DIY installation, no additional drilling required.

Activity Logging: Stay informed about entries and exits with the smart lock's activity log feature. Easily track who accessed your home and when. Smart locks featuring intrusion alert capability are your guardians against unauthorized access. Should anyone attempt illegal entry, rest assured that the system will promptly activate an alarm.

Remote Control: Smart Deadbolt Through a mobile app, you can remotely manage the smart lock, including unlocking, locking, and monitoring its status from afar(Gateway required). Effortlessly grant access to visitors or service personnel without the need for physical keys.

Smart lock Support a variety of unlocking methods for you to choose: Touch screen password unlock, IC Fobs unlock, mechanical key unlock, app unlock, remote gateway (optional), and Alexa voice unlock (optional).Work with Apple Watch unlock it with a tap on your watch.

SMONET Professional Customer Service: 30-Day No-Questions-Asked Return Policy, 1-Year Free Replacement, 2-Year Warranty, We firmly stand by our commitment to providing the best possible support and value to our valued customers.We will offer a toll-free customer service hotline and an after-sales email at your disposal, with the commitment to address any inquiries within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Auto Lock You can set the automatic locking in 01-60 seconds. No worry about forgetting to lock the door. Works with Smart Devices Connect a SMONET G2 gateway(Sold Separately), support to work with alexa or google home, and you can lock or unlock your smart deadbolt from anywhere. Safe Mode Press the reset button to open the safe mode that only the admin code be able to override the smart door lock.

Battery Back-Up 4 pcs AA batteries provide 5000 openings(approx.4-6 months), you can also check the battery status on TTLock App. Use the 9V battery to charge your lock in an emergency when you forget to replace the battery. Anti-peep Password Type in random digits, it's still gain access as long as the real password is entered continuously in the longer set of numbers. Strangers cannot steal your password by fingerprints or watching it nearby. One-Touch Locking Press the # sign for two seconds, very easy to lock.

Important Installation Tips & Warm Notice Please note the L/R side has different install method. You could follow the tips in videoPlease note you are setting the corret direction for toggle button(L/R). Otherwise it will be backwards.If you can't use the APP or keypad to control unless insert a key(lock is stuck), please help to check: re-install after rotate the spindle by 90 degree.Back panel direction: Horizontal for Left handle side. Vertical for right handle side. Otherwise the lock will stuck.If the lock is in a non-addable state (the name is gray on the APP), please try to reset the lock. The keyboard has a protective film, please peel off before use.

Smart Deadbolt Black Smart Deadbolt Silver Fingerprint Deadbolt Wi-Fi Gateway Material Zinc Alloy Zinc Alloy Zinc Alloy ABS Handle L/R L/R L/R / Color Black Silver Black White Auto Lock Time 5s-Custom 5s-Custom 5s-Custom / Product Dimensions 6.30 x 2.56 x 1.77 in 6.30 x 2.56 x 1.77 in 6.30 x 2.56 x 1.77 in 2.75 x 2.75 x 1.02 in Power Supply Mode 4 AA Batteries 4 AA Batteries 4 AA Batteries Type C Line

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Lock with a lot of great features.
reviews.reviewText: Overall, the lock has worked super well for the last year. Installing it was simple, as was hooking it up to the app. (though there are 2 different apps you can use... Next Lock was the one I found worked the best for setting up fingerprints and such)Fingerprint scanner worked, and I was able to set up several fingerprints for me, and for my kids. I didnt ever use the NFC Fobs to unlock since fingerprint was easier than using even wireless keys, but they did work when I tested them.My lock did break unfortunately. A part on the inside broke off and shorted out the motor which unlocks and locks the phone from what I can tell. I reached out to their customer support and they helped me out to get the issue resolved, which I am super grateful for.Overall, these are great, and not nearly as expensive as the other smart locks. (plus they have more features!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently installed this smart lock, and it has truly exceeded my expectations. The sleek design seamlessly blends with my door, and the installation process was surprisingly straightforward. The convenience of keyless entry is a game-changer, and the mobile app allows me to monitor and control access effortlessly. The robust security features provide peace of mind, making it a worthwhile investment for anyone looking to upgrade their home security.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good enough after a year that I am ordering another!
reviews.reviewText: I was so pleased with the first lock that I installed a year-and-a-half ago that I bought another one. This is a follow-up from my first lock review (see below).DOCUMENTED PERFORMANCEAfter more than a year, I can say that the first unit has performed flawlessly. And I am still on the first set of batteries I installed! I only use the lock about once a day, but the result indicates there is no incidental power drain taking place.EASE OF INSTALLATIONThe instructions are a bit sketchy, but having installed one before the actual process itself is super-easy. I strongly advise that you watch one of the many videos on this installation if you are not familiar with such things. Replacing an existing, compatible lock does not take a special skillset, but re-reading the instructions four times will slow you down.TOOLS/PROCEDURESUnlike most companies, they give you plenty of extra screws and parts. You even get a half-decent screw-driver. Obviously if you are installing this in a blank door, you will need tools to cut all of the various holes. If you are replacing an existing lock, you will likely need to drill one hole. A quality drill bit is included! All the holes are easily lined up with an included template.COMPLAINTSI suspect that 95% of the complaints that the lock did not work properly after installing are due to failure to identify the door as being either right or left handed, and setting the controls accordingly (see comment below).I haven't gotten into any programming other than setting up passcodes. I can, however, see that the programming directions are quite confusing. This is a complaint others have voiced. Again, I would defer to videos or explanations on various websites. It's a lock, and supported by many installers.=============FIRST LOCK REVIEWThis lock has performed flawlessly, on the same batteries I might add, for 15 months. Never fails to open with the keypad, or with BlueTooth. The BlueTooth works better than advertised--at least 50 yards away. This unit is installed under a small porch roof, with minimal exposure to weather other than in a heavy blow.Simple to install. Direct replacement for standard deadbolt setup. MAKE SURE YOU PERFORM BOTH STEPS TO SET IT UP FOR EITHER RIGHT OR LEFT HAND DOOR! 1) Move internal switch to proper position. 2) Turn knob to the orientation they specify BEFORE you start installing.This is an attractive and well-built unit. I expect the mechanical parts to function for my lifetime. The life of the electronics are anyone's guess. However, with the quality I see built into the mechanics, I doubt they would skimp on the electronics. After having done much research on this unit, I am extremely pleased with the result.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and great features
reviews.reviewText: Lock was easy to install. I was surprised with how great the lock worked and what a great value it was with all of the features. The finger print detector reads your fingers so easily and love how she speaks to you. However, once I had to change the batteries the device stopped working. Luckily the device still had warranty. The support team was amazing. They saw I had tried calling and reached out back to me through text. The team was very responsive and helpful and were quick to send a new lock out. I had a new lock within the week. They stayed on top of everything ensured I received the new lock and everything was ok. Grea

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this keyless entry 2023. It worked great until I had to change out the batteries. Unfortunately, it stopped working and I was passed the return time. Luckily I looked into the warranty and it was still warranted. I reached out to the user on Amazon and within a day they reached out to me. I spoke with Elaine from Smonet Smart Lock Tech support and through text she walked me through the process. We did some reseting on my end and on their end. Unfortunately, it still did not work. Elaine was able to send me a new device. She reached out to me via text to let me know that she mailed out a new lock. Within in a week I had my device. She followed up to make sure the new device was programmed and functional. I have to say for being in completely different time zones she had one of the best communication skills. Very prompt and her follow up was on point. Very satisfied with her and the companies customer service. I highly recommend this device and guarantee you will have someone on the other side for any trouble shooting issues. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this product! I host about 4-5 different groups every month and is very quick and easy to change the code. And I like that it can have multiple codes stored at once. That way I can have designated codes for guests and my cleaners. I only use the keypad feature I don’t use any of the other features like finger print or Alexa so I can’t speak on those. But the keypad works great for my needs 👍🏻
Easy to install and operate. App integration is nice, pretty much everything can be done on app. Customer support is great for any help needed with installation or operation.

reviews.reviewTitle: Solid smart lock with a few caveats
reviews.reviewText: Looks nice, has lots of functionality with the app, was easy to install. Have not run into any issues with it. However, there are a few things I noticed with this smart lock.This smart lock boasts bluetooth capability and I had thought it would use bluetooth proximity from my phone to lock/unlock, but it can't. For example if I got home and walked to the door with my phone in my pocket, the smart lock would unlock. However, this lock does not have that feature.In addition, the material the touchpad is made of will make it very evident of what buttons are being pressed over time. So you will need to either clean the touchpad every once in a while or change your passcode to use other numbers, for security purposes.Lastly the keys that come with the smart lock look and feel very cheap.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works, but software is capricious and occasionally confusing
reviews.reviewText: The locksmith guy wasn't familiar with it, but installed it without any significant problems, and pointed out that its neoprene seal will protect it again water damage in driving rain, which appears to have impaired three previous locks of ours of a better-known brand (that starts with "Sch"—never again).Being able to lock and unlock with the app is nice. The Auto-lock feature is quite useful. The automatic record of locking/unlocking (but only when that's done with the app) is a bonus. The remote locking would be useful, but requires a Gateway, which is a separate purchase. The best feature (when it works) is being able to give someone an eKey or Passcode for a set date and time period (so a tenant's access automatically expires at the end of their tenancy period), or one-time only, or on a recurring basis.The key (no pun intended) phrase here is "when it works". After nearly a month's use, the biggest problem is the software, which has confusing interface issues, and curious glitches. For some reason, the lock/unlock settings have reversed. (The FAQ acknowledges this problem, and suggests a fix by switching a toggle "on the back panel", which we have no idea what that means, as it is not shown in the diagram.) Also, it is unclear what is the difference (or the relationship) between "Passcodes" and "eKeys", and setting someone up with either only for worked for two of us—the other two are having to use the physical key. The good news is that the physical keys cannot be duplicated.Bottom line: if the software glitches and interface were to be fixed, this lock would rate a full five stars. As it is, it's good, but with limitations.

reviews.reviewTitle: Impressively advance smart lock with one time passcode generation
reviews.reviewText: There are only 11 steps to install the smart lock to the door. Quite easy installation with screws and screwdriver provided with the pack. You will have to buy a door hole driller to drill a hole first so that the lock can fit it.After installation is done, you have to download an app and register.The lock has two keys supplied in the pack. You can also use the keypads to lock/lock . The third type is using the app to lock/unlock. You can even control the lock using Bluetooth.The most interesting part is the remote unlock/ lock. Add a gateway and link the lock to the wifi.The admin can generate one type password for visitors .If you often forget to lock the door, you can set automatic unlock.Another interesting part is you can link your smart watch to the lock.This is as very advanced smart lock and discovering all these functions makes me feel fascinated and high tech. Not only a fancy product but also enables easier locking of doors .If you don't like carrying keys , this way you can reduce the amount of keys and yet have the benefit of deadlocks. Really enjoy and like using this product.The quality of the lock is heavy and solid .
